title: Banker Shortage Pressures Hong Kong Firms Handling IPO Boom
description: Hong Kong firms are on the hunt for more bankers to lead a booming pipeline of initial public offering deals after a years-long dry spell depleted the ranks of qualified staffers.
content: Hong Kong firms are on the hunt for more bankers to lead a booming pipeline of initial public offering deals after a years-long dry spell depleted the ranks of qualified staffers.
